General.Name: Ekadharma International Tbk
General.Description: PT Ekadharma International Tbk, together with its subsidiaries, manufactures and sells self adhesive tapes and related materials in Indonesia and Malaysia. The company offers aluminum foil and anti-slip tape; cling wrap, double foam, cloth, and double side tape; epoxy glue, kraft, masking, metalizing tape, OPP, OPP printing, PVC electrical insulation, and stationary tapes; stretch films; and water glue, white glue, super glue, and glue stick under the DAIMARU, SUPERFIX, and EKATAPE brands. It also provides adjustable carton sealer with fold flap closer; top drive, side drive, and random semi-automatic carton sealers; and semi-automatic stretch wrappers under the BESTPACK brand. The company was formerly known as PT Ekadharma Widya Grafika and changed its name to PT Ekadharma International Tbk in 2006. The company was founded in 1981 and is headquartered in Tangerang, Indonesia. PT Ekadharma International Tbk is a subsidiary of PT Ekadharma Inti Perkasa.
